name: hupo-ui
description: hupo ui基础组件库&接口能力

scripts.build: cml wx build && cml web build
scripts.publish: node ./bin/changeVersion.js && sh ./bin/publish.ui.sh && cd package && npm publish
scripts.publish-tools: node ./bin/changeVersion.js && sh ./bin/publish.tools.sh && cd package && npm publish
